title: First
body:
Oh, hey there! You must be the new little robot helper thing - Kai, right?
[[ Yep! |Yep]]
[[ Beep Boop.. |Beep]]

title: Beep
body:
Well... Boop Bop to you too! You must be headed to Together Credit Union. 
[[ I am! |Yes]]
[[ Yeehaw! |Yes]]

title: Yes
body:
Great! They'll be super excited to see you! Do you know how to get there?
[[ I'll figure it out! |GotIt]] 
[[ Uhh.. no. |Nope]]

title: Yep
body:
That's cool! You must be headed to Together Credit Union.
[[ I am! |Yes]]
[[ I is! |Yes]]

title: Second
body: Well.. what are ya waitin' for?

title: GotIt
body: Great! You really can't go wrong following the trail. Good luck!

title: Nope
body: Oh.. well you really can't go wrong following the trail. Good luck!

title: NPC2First
body:
Hi Kai! I've been waitin' for ya! Ready to learn about banking stuff?
[[ Yeah! |Yes1]]
[[ Banksies? |No1]]

title: Yes1
body: Great! Click the red play button to watch a short vid!

title: No1
body: Uhh.. sure? Click the red play button to watch a short vid.
